name: tripadvisor_bulk_search
description: Bulk search multiple destinations on TripAdvisor in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Returns search results for each destination.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'hotels in Paris,restaurants in Rome,things to do Tokyo')

detailSteps.code: const currentQuery = `{{@item.query}}`; const results = []; const cards = document.querySelectorAll('[data-test-target="search-result"], .result-title, .search-result, .result, [class*="search_result"], [class*="SearchResult"]'); const seen = new Set(); for (let i = 0; i < cards.length && results.length < 10; i++) { const el = cards[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('a[onclick], a[href*="-Reviews-"], a[href*="Attraction_Review"], a[href*="Restaurant_Review"], a[href*="Hotel_Review"], .result-title span, [class*="title"] a, h3 a'); const linkEl = titleEl || el.querySelector('a[href*="tripadvisor"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('svg[aria-label*="bubble"], .ui_bubble_rating, [class*="bubble"]'); const reviewCountEl = el.querySelector('[class*="review_count"], [class*="reviewCount"], span[class*="count"]'); const typeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="search-result-badge"], [class*="type"], [class*="category"]'); const name = titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : ''; const url = linkEl ? (linkEl.href.startsWith('http') ? linkEl.href : 'https://www.tripadvisor.com' + linkEl.getAttribute('href')) : ''; if (name && !seen.has(name)) { seen.add(name); results.push({ name: name, type: typeEl ? typeEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? (ratingEl.getAttribute('aria-label') || '') : '', review_count: reviewCountEl ? reviewCountEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: url }); } } return { query: currentQuery, result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_data
detailSteps.label: Extract search results
